metadata.title: CVE-2019-13104 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Das U-Boot versions 2016.11-rc1 through 2019.07-rc4, an underflow cancause memcpy() to overwrite a very large amount of data (including thewhole stack) while reading a crafted ext4 filesystem.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
